dashboard.welcomeDesc: Access all the tools you need to optimize your farming operations in one place

features.weatherDesc: Get real-time weather updates and personalized cultivation advice for your crops based on local conditions.
features.diseaseDesc: Identify plant diseases early using AI-powered image analysis and get instant treatment recommendations.
features.chatbotDesc: Chat with our intelligent AI assistant for instant farming advice, tips, and answers to all your questions.
features.marketDesc: Stay updated with real-time market prices and trends to make informed selling decisions and maximize profits.

weather.card1Desc: Get accurate weather forecasts and alerts for your region
weather.card2Desc: Personalized advice based on weather patterns and soil conditions
weather.card3Desc: Plan your crops according to seasonal weather predictions

disease.card1Desc: Scan plant leaves using your phone camera for instant disease identification
disease.card2Desc: Get detailed treatment recommendations and prevention methods
disease.card3Desc: Access comprehensive database of crop diseases and symptoms

chatbot.card1Desc: Get instant answers to your farming questions anytime, anywhere
chatbot.card2Desc: Access agricultural expertise and best farming practices instantly
chatbot.card3Desc: Communicate in your preferred language for better understanding

market.card1Desc: Track real-time market prices for all major crops and commodities
market.card2Desc: Analyze historical trends to decide the best time to sell
market.card3Desc: Compare prices across different mandis in your region
